Name: Issue 268
Summary: Styleable Buttons, VS Productivity Tips, UI Challenges, App Themes and a nifty Range Selector control. So much goodness!
Introduction: Happy Friday! A good collection of links this week covering lots of Xamarin topics. Also if you are reading this on Friday remember that Xamarin Assemble 2020 is on at the moment with free online sessions by leaders in the Xamarin community. Have a peaceful weekend, ❤ Kym

Articles.Title: Resources to learn mobile development
Articles.Description: Resources to get you started with learning Xamarin including the XamU content.
Articles.Author: Saamer Mansoor

Articles.Title: SpecFlow BDD Testing with Xamarin.Forms!
Articles.Description: Udara explores the possibilities of the awesome SpecFlow Behavior Driven Testing Framework with Xamarin.Forms!
Articles.Author: Udara Alwis

Articles.Title: 10 Visual Studio Navigation Productivity Tips
Articles.Description: A large code base is a complex asset. Visual Studio is a complex environment. In this context developers spend a significant part of their time searching and navigating across code elements and the multiple IDE tools and options.
Articles.Author: Patrick Smacchia

Articles.Title: Building a styleable “Content Button”
Articles.Description: What do you do when you need a more flexible button than the one that is shipped with Xamarin.Forms? If you are Daniel Hindrikes you create your own and jam in PancakeViewfor good measure.
Articles.Author: Daniel Hindrikes

Articles.Title: Code Snippet Strategies
Articles.Description: Glenn shares his favorite snippets, including comet.  He also shares when and how he uses snippets as well.
Articles.Author: Glenn Stephens

Articles.Title: Building an ERP Application with Xamarin.Forms
Articles.Description: The Telerik ERP is a fully functional, feature-rich cross-platform enterprise resource management app build with Telerik’s high-performant UI controls for Xamarin, Microsoft Azure’s services & the MvvmCross framework.  Even if you dont' use Telerik controls, you might be interest to dig into the source code.
Articles.Author: Atanas Popatanasov

Articles.Title: SwipeView in Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description: The swipe action is pretty much common place these days.  Xamarin.Forms has a SwipeView which makes adding a swipe action to your application a piece-of-cake.
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: Real Estate Property details UI
Articles.Description: Creating a nice looking Real Estate UI in Xamarin.Forms with Leomaris.
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: Improving CollectionView Scrolling
Articles.Description: Brandon improves the performance of the CollectionView by removing bindings from DataTemplate and increasing the size of the Android Nursery which decreases the frequency of garbage collections.
Articles.Author: Brandon Minnick

Articles.Title: App Themes for Xamarin.Forms
Articles.Description: All major OSes now support dark and light app themes, and Xamarin.Forms 4.7 has arrived to make this easy to add to your applications.
Articles.Author: David Ortinau

Articles.Title: Using Firebase Databases
Articles.Description: Firebase is a popular choice of database for many native android developers. Can you use it with Xamarin.Forms? Of course you can, let Thiago show you how. *Note: Post is in Portuguese*
Articles.Author: Thiago Bertuzzi

Articles.Title: Progress Ring with Counter
Articles.Description: See how to build a progress ring with a counter in the middle.
Articles.Author: Samir G.C

Articles.Title: Introducing C# Markup for Xamarin.Forms
Articles.Description: Xamarin.Forms 4.6 introduced C# Markup, a set of fluent helpers and classes that aim to make UI development in C# a joy.
Articles.Author: Vincent Hoogendoorn

Articles.Title: Disable bounce effect on CollectionView
Articles.Description: If you've ever wanted to get rid of the bounce effect on the CollectionView then Gerald has a solution for you.
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis

Articles.Title: Understanding .NET MAUI and the future of Xamarin
Articles.Description: The move towards Maui can seem scary to some Xamarin developers.  But it's not bad, it's just Xamarin growing up.
Articles.Author: Simon Bisson

Articles.Title: Xamarin.Forms - Debugging WebView
Articles.Description: Sometimes you need to be able to debug the WebView in Xamarin.Forms. Here is how you can do it.
Articles.Author: Delpin Susai Raj

Articles.Title: Range Slider Control
Articles.Description: Andrei gives us a really cool Xamarin.Forms Range Slider control which allows your users to specify values between a range of values.
Articles.Author: Andrei Misiukevich

Articles.Title: Merge Conflict 210 - I Should Buy a Mac Mini Every Summer
Articles.Description: Beta summers, favorite C# 9 features, best new cross-platform app frameworks, and USB-C on this week's lightning topics!
Articles.Author: Merge Conflict

Articles.Title: Inverter Converter and Xamarin.Forms 4.7
Articles.Description: Xamarin.Forms 4.7 is out and the Inverter Converter is all the rage!! This month James and Matt run down the rest of the great features in Xamarin.Forms 4.7

Articles.Title: Hot Restart - Easily Debug to iOS Devices
Articles.Description: This week, James is joined by Maddy Leger, Program Manager for Xamarin Tooling, who shows off Hot Restart, one of the coolest new features of Xamarin.
Articles.Author: James Montemagno
